summary: Hey you! yes you! did you ever think your wings were somewhat dull and lifeless? ye? thats good man, thats REAL good.Because i have the solution for you! Introducing ShroudSage's Juicy dragon wings! a Retexture of the glorious Anton0028's original mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]ORIGINAL MOD IS REQUIRED BROZITH!

What is this ? where am i?[/size]

[size=4]Hey you! yes you! did you ever think your wings were somewhat dull and lifeless? ye? thats good man, thats REAL good.Because i have the solution for you! [/size][size=4]Introducing ShroudSage's Juicy dragon wings! a Retexture of the glorious Anton0028's original mod.

[/size][size=6]gee wizz mister! thats splendid! but why?[/size]
[size=3]well young billy,although i absolutely loved Anton0028's work, the wings just seemed a bit....."meh" colored for a mighty dragonborn.so i retextured them to seem more exotic, and well juicy? yea lets stick with juicy.

[/size]
[size=6]Well thats mighty fancy mister! but how do i install it?

[/size][size=3]Well billy im glad you asked! follow the below steps and i guarantee the female dragons will be perching all over you in no time! (warning shroud does not guarantee that your life will not be in peril from said dragons landing on you and attempting to mate)

[/size][size=5]Step 1. [/size][size=3]download my retexture. ok? we good? good. [/size]

[size=5]step 2. [/size][size=4]download the main mod this is meant for made by anton0028 which can be found here----> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?  install normally or whatever it is you do to jam those mods into your game.......i know what you do when nobody is looking.you should be ashamed.

[/size][size=5]Step 3.[/size][size=3]open up Anton's dragon wing mod folder,and drop my retexture folder you donwloaded here, into hes texture folder. when it asks to overwrite, DO IT.HE HAS A GUN.
[/size][size=5]Step 4. [/size][size=3]thats it.if you decide you dont want my fabulous dragon wings anymore simply reinstall the mod and hey presto.normal wings ahoy.[/size]


[size=5]Thanks! but who are you?!
[/size][size=3]"IT IS I! MATHEW PATELL!" nah but im actually the guy who made the first ever "play as sheogorath" mod on the steam workshop.i Went by the name Arceus back then.and now im shroud.

[/size][size=5]What are you future modding plans?
[/size][size=3]Well kevin, im glad you asked.ive been practising voice acting recently along with textures and would love to contribute to some sort of follower mod or quest mod. until then i will be retexturing awesome outfits from other people and perhaps releasing some of my LOL presets . only time will tell.[/size]
author: ShroudSage
